alert.note: Alert for Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:01AM CST until February 27 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN POLK AND NORTHERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 201 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Walnut Grove to near Ash Grove to 6 miles southwest of Willard, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Willard, Ash Grove, Fair Grove, Walnut Grove, Sacville, Glidewell, Cave Springs, Ebenezer, Eudora, Brighton and Bois D`arc. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
